term.title: heteroarenes

item.text: Heterocyclic compounds formally derived from arenes by replacement of one or more methine (–C=) and/or vinylene (–CH=CH–) groups by trivalent or divalent heteroatoms, respectively, in such a way as to maintain the continuous π-electron system characteristic of aromatic systems and a number of out-of-plane π-electrons corresponding to the Hückel rule (4n + 2); an alternative term is hetarenes. [image: Not defined]
